data: New Forest | King Edward the First | Nowells | Hall of Nowelhurst
Within the New Forest, and not far from its western boundary, as defined by the second perambulation of the good King Edward the First, stands the old mansion of the Nowells, the Hall of Nowelhurst.
Cradock Nowell: A Tale of the New Forest. Vol. 1
